name: TalkNako
_source: speak;Nako;Ah, Lord Sages, you've come to pay me a visit?|I'm just watching the training in case someone gets hurt.
speak;Sages;How caring, you really are Arcei's greatest servant.|I just wanted to say thanks.
speak;Nako;Oh! Thank you!|It's... embarassing seeing you all grown up.|Makes me feel so old...
speak;Sages;Oh, don't be silly!|You're the picture of youth!
speak;Nako;Heehee, words really are as powerful as weapons sometimes...
speak;Sages;One's charisma is important.|Though saying the wrong thing almost got me killed, numerous times...
speak;Nako;And at least half of those times was Sal!
